nodes.text: A massacre took place at the location Anx Minor during the Galactic Civil War, prior to the New Republic's campaign in the Cerberon system. Around 5 ABY, the New Republic Intelligence flagged the massacre at Anx Minor as possible activity of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. The event was then reviewed by the New Republic Intelligence agent Caern Adan and his colleague Yrica Quell. Quell felt that the massacre had similarities with the 204th's raid on Beauchen, but also noted that it was distant from other reviewed events on her and Adan's map.
The massacre at Anx Minor was mentioned in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
